parsing_warnings: Buyer email and phone not found in Bill To section
No seller or buyer tax ID found on document
Tax applied at invoice-level (Tax 8.5% $49.73); no per-line tax detail provided
checks: Tax 8.5% of (Subtotal - Discount) = 585.00 × 0.085 = 49.725 → rounded to $49.73 (matches Tax line)
